import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import AdminDashboardForAll from "../AdminDashboardForAll"; import {FaStar, FaBackward, FaArrowDown, FaPlus} from "react-icons/fa"; import axios from "axios"; const AddBook = () =>{ let history = useHistory(); const [books, setBookValue] = useState({ bk_title: "", bk_author: "", bk_edition: "", bk_publisher: "", bk_publication_date: "", bk_copies: "", bk_category: "", bk_rack_no: "" }); const { bk_title, bk_author, ebk_edition, bk_publisher, bk_publication_date, bk_copies, bk_category, bk_rack_no} = books; const inputEvent = (event) =>{ setBookValue({ ...books, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } const onSubmitForm = async (event) =>{ event.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/books", books); history.push("/"); } return( <>

); } export default AddBook;
